description: Single storey rear and side infill (wrap around) extension; replacement of balustrade to existing rear terrace at second floor level; and associated external alterations
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings / document title number(s): 1219-00-00 (Location and Site Plan), 1219-01-01 (Existing Garden Plan), 1219-01-02 (Existing Ground Floor Plan), 1219-01-03 (Existing First Floor Plan), 1219-01-04 (Existing Second Floor Plan), 1219-01-05 (Existing Roof Top Plan), 1219-01-06 (Existing Section AA), 1219-01-07 (Existing Section BB), 1219-01-08 (Existing Front Elevation), 1219-01-09 (Existing Side Elevation), 1219-01-10 (Existing Rear Elevation), 1219-02-01 (Proposed Garden Plan), 1219-02-02 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan), 1219-02-03 (Proposed First Floor Plan), 1219-02-04 (Proposed Second Floor Plan), 1219-02-05 (Proposed Roof Plan), 1219-02-06 (Proposed Section AA), 1219-02-07 (Proposed Section BB), 1219-02-08 (Proposed Front Elevation), 1219-02-09 (Proposed Side Elevation 1), 1219-02-10 (Proposed Rear Elevation), 1219-02-011 (Proposed Side Elevation 2) and Design & Access Statement.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3 & D4 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013).

| No part of the flat roofs of the hereby approved development (other than those indicated on the hereby approved plans listed in Condition 2) shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with Policies 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
